nodes.text: An LEP servant droid that belonged to General Whorm Loathsom of the Confederacy of Independent Systems came into use as his personal servant during the Battle of Christophsis. It was equipped with a holoprojector that was place on top of it's head and was detachable.

When General Whorm Loathsom was deploying an energy shield during the Battle of Christophsis in 22 BBY, his servant droid brought him a hologram transmission of a B1 battle droid reporting that their lead tanks are approaching the city center and the Republic forces are retreating. Loathsom replied by ordering to get to the Republic's heavy cannons as quickly as possible.

During the battle, Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi was stalling Loathsom by pretending to negotiate the terms of surrender. After Kenobi's request, Loathsom ordered the servant droid to bring them refreshments, to which he went on to serve them a beverage. However, the talks were soon ended by Loathsom and Kenobi was grabbed by B2-series super battle droids. When the Jedi Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano managed to destroy the separatist shield generator, Kenobi jumped behind Loathsom, after which the LEP servant droid was destroyed by a B2 battle droid attempting to fire at Kenobi.
